channel.title: Project p2p source bugs
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Are there any known bugs in the project p2p source which was released a while ago ? If you guys know any could you please post them and also post any fixes which may be out there if possible.
Thanks.

item.title: Project p2p source bugs
item.dc:creator: @froggie froggie
item.description:
@froggie wrote:

After running the source for a couple of days and allowing a limited amount of players to log into it, I have noticed that the server crashes after 1-2 days for unknown reasons.

Read full topic

item.title: Project p2p source bugs
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

[quote="[A"]mpd link=topic=367693.msg2786917#msg2786917 date=1242531918]

[quote author=termz link=topic=367693.msg2786905#msg2786905 date=1242531598]

The best option for you is to actually use the source, work with it and find the bugs out for yourself.

Alternatively, you could ask Matt, but I am very doubtful he’ll help you out with it.

I am quite sure that Matt did mention is was kinda buggy, but just work by trial and error.
[/quote] i would not ask matt seeing the fact that he had everyone else code for him and added very little himself. matt= fail at coding

I wouldn’t doubt that… he probably doesn’t even know how to fix those bugs.[/quote]

Nor do you. /fail.

-Kozy

Read full topic

item.title: Project p2p source bugs
item.dc:creator: @_A_mpd [A]mpd
item.description:
@_A_mpd wrote:

[quote=“surprise buttsecks, post:10, topic:278548”][quote author=salrathor1 link=topic=367693.msg2788279#msg2788279 date=1242595602]
Hey guys,

I dont mean to preach or anything but if you dont have anything nice to say dont say anything at all. I don’t know whether Matt coded every part of his server or not but there is no need to turn this into a dissing board against him.

Seriously, there is way too much dissing going on around the rsc community and then we wonder why there is so much ddosing going on. If someone makes a server then leave them to it… If you like it, play it… if you then dont like it… then just dont play it.

[/quote]

yo fuck u and your gay preaching nigger[/quote]

Since when is having common sense considered “preaching”?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ss_Goblin wrote:

Hello salrathor1.

  1. Look in tradehandler, and duelhandler, if its possible to duel and trade yourself.

People try to find bugs all the time, if they find any… theyr using them, they dont help to secure it.

Anyway, hope you get rid with this…
